name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience developing high-performance applications, specializing in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **Koa** frameworks. Expertise in building scalable backend systems with technologies including **NestJS**, **MongoDB**, **Kafka**, and **Redis**. Proven track record in performance monitoring and optimization using **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, and **Datadog**. 

Skilled in deploying cloud-native applications and implementing microservices architecture. Previously, developed AI/ML-powered platforms that drive predictive analytics and automation. Well-versed in compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring alignment with best practices in the healthcare and financial sectors. Adept in the orchestration of machine learning workflows utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
